TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for your email.
If you decommissioned the server, then the uninstallation jobs that you have pending for those devices will not be further applied.
If you log in with an admin user on those computers and uninstall them manually, then it shouldn't influence it. 

Best regards,
Alin Anca

Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com
